title: AAR Horror SFX Pack
description: Immerse players in spine-chilling horror with 415 meticulously crafted SFXs. From ambience to nerve-wracking tension.
longDescription:
Horro SFX Pack


Step into the realm of nightmares and embrace the spine-chilling atmosphere with our Horror SFX Pack. With 415 meticulously crafted sound effects, this pack is your key to immersing players in a world of fear and suspense like never before.


Sound sets include: Ambience, Atmosphere, Foley, System, and Tension.


Ambience:

Immerse players in the haunting depths of your game world with eerie ambient sounds. From the stormy night to the distant howls of otherworldly creatures, our Ambience set sets the stage for a journey into terror.


Atmosphere:

Heighten the tension and send chills down players' spines with our atmospheric soundscapes. From the spooky melody to the disturbing drone, every sound in this set is designed to keep players on edge.


Foley:

Add a touch of realism to your horror game with our foley collection. From the creaking of floorboards to the dripping of blood, these sounds bring your game world to life in terrifying detail, ensuring that every moment is filled with dread.


System:

Seamlessly integrate our system sounds into your game mechanics to enhance the horror experience. With glitchy effects, ominous alerts, and foreboding transitions, this set will keep players on their toes and immersed in fear.


Tension:

Keep players on the edge of their seats with our tension-building sounds. From heart-pounding rhythms to nerve-wracking drones, these sounds escalate the suspense and anticipation, leading to unforgettable moments of terror.


Pack Preview
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 415

Number of Audio Cues: 415

Sample rate / bit rate: 48kHz/ 24Bits

Do Sound FX loop: Yes (For Ambience and Atmosphere)
